teamTasks.confirmEditTitle: Sigur doriți să redactați această sarcină?
teamTasks.confirmDeleteTitle: Sigur doriți să ștergeți această sarcină?
teamTasks.confirmEditBlurb: Related item tasks will be modified as a consequence of applying this change, except for those that have already been answered or resolved.
teamTasks.confirmDeleteBlurb: Related item tasks will be deleted as a consequence of applying this change, except for those that have already been answered or resolved.
